name: A TETHER IN TIME
description:
made for the GMTK 2021 gamejam.

You and your companion are exploring an ancient temple. The temple allows you to freeze time. Tethered to your companion you must freeze and swing across three simple levels.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys - movement
  • Space - switch character 
  •  Z and X - freeze time. 
  •  R - reset

Wasn't able to upload cover image that I wanted because I don't have the image on mobile.
